turtle_shield.description: A turtle shell used as a shield

starfish.description: A.k.a. Sea Stars, starfish is not really a fish.

bead_door.description: Many strings with beads dropping from the ceiling

porthole.description: Small round window common in ships
porthole.flavor:
Why are ships' portholes round?
So that if they break, water doesn't hit you square in the face.

input_food_bin.description: A supply container, for food donations

palm_tree_crop.description: Out of trees? Get ready to participate in reforestation.

growth_stage_0.name: Seed Pod
growth_stage_0.description: It is just a buried cononut.

growth_stage_1.name: Palm Tree Seedling
growth_stage_1.description: It finally pierced through the shell.

growth_stage_3.name: Palm Tree Sapling
growth_stage_3.description: Ready to be transferred to a bigger plot.

recipe.description: Can be placed in the ground or hang in walls
recipe.flavor: If a boat were a head, would its anchors be earrings?

dock.description: A platform where fishers go to fish

ice_dock.description: A hole in the ice where fishers go to fish

fancy_fisher_sign.description: A fancy sign with the mark of the fisher

fisher_sign.description: A sign with the mark of the fisher

recipe.description: Easier to sell your coconuts this way.

recipe.flavor: Flowers can add extra beauty to walls!

pirate_flag.description: Not a good way to make friends

recipe.description: The starting point of any naval fleet.
recipe.flavor: Maybe you can sail in it if you dream hard enough!

sand_castle.description: The Sand Princess is in another sand castle

recipe.description: Uses sand (clay) to build your dream castle
recipe.flavor: 4 years in architecture school to build this?

ship_wheel.description: So you can guide your dreams

recipe.description: Could be used to steer a ship, but nowadays it is mostly used for decorations
recipe.flavor: You know what would be good with it? A ship!

recipe.description: An outdoor light attached to a long pole fixed into the ground.
recipe.flavor: Will brighten up the party and keep bugs at bay

totem.flavor: A turtle, a crab and a seagull

recipe.description: A flavorful broth of coconut milk with crab meat.
recipe.flavor: There's nothing not to love in this rich soup that combines two amazing ingredients.

crab_cake.description: A patty of flaked or minced crab meat, typically served fried.

recipe.description: A patty of flaked or minced crab meat, typically served fried.
Just let it heat in the oven.
A warm, savory broth, where the fish gets very soft.

recipe.flavor: Healthier, but you will still get fat if you eat a lot.

recipe.description: Keep you nice and cool on a hot day.
recipe.flavor: It is a great starter for the morning

sashimi.description: Fresh raw fish sliced into thin pieces

recipe.flavor: Crabs can pinch you, from below...

recipe.description: After placed, it will explode when enemies hit it. Damage and set fire to enemies near the explosion.

fake_container.description: Break it to check what is inside

octopus.description: Arms, more than you can count

hibiscus_plant.description: Can be harvested for healing herbs
hibiscus_plant.unripe_description: This plant has been harvested and has not grown back yet

seed.description: Once planted, it will grow into healing herbs

sprout.description: Just needs some time and care.

bud.description: Its almost there!  Look, it has buds!

blue_hibiscus_plant.description: Rare, can be harvested for healing herbs
blue_hibiscus_plant.unripe_description: This plant has been harvested and has not grown back yet

seed.description: Once planted, it will grow into healing herbs

sprout.description: Just needs some time and care.

bud.description: Its almost there!  Look, it has buds!

pearl.description: Perhaps the best-loved gem of all time

black_pearl.description: Full of curses, sells for a good price

hibiscus.description: A beautiful tropical bloom with healing properties

blue_hibiscus.description: A rare tropical bloom with healing properties

hot_rock.description: Rich in minerals, just mine it

common_palm.description: A symbol of the tropical island paradise.
common_palm.unripe_description: No coconuts yet. A symbol of the tropical island paradise.

seed.description: Can be planted to grow a dranden tree

sprout.description: Just needs some time and care.

bud.description: Its almost there!  It's growing its adult leaves!

seed.description: Can be planted to grow a smalea tree

sprout.description: Just needs some time and care.

bud.description: Its almost there!  It's growing its adult leaves!

papaya.description: A large, tree-like plant (it is not a tree?)

seed.description: Can be planted to grow a papaya tree

sprout.description: Just needs some time and care.

bud.description: Its almost there!  It's growing its adult leaves!

visitor_outfit.description: Common worker outfit from another island

fisher_description.description: Will capture crabs, harvest pearls, and do other water related works

level_1.perk_description: The fisher can craft tools to help catching fish.

level_2.perk_description: The fisher can now craft and place traps to capture crabs.

fisher_bucket_talisman.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a Fisher

fisher_rod.description: A long, flexible rod used to catch fish

fisher_firepit.flavor: For better food, visit your main cooks

fisher_bucket_recipe.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a Fisher.

crab_pincer_recipe.description: A weapon that you can wear in your hand!
crab_pincer_recipe.flavor: Clean it before putting your hand inside!

crab_trap_recipe.description: It will attract and capture nearby crabs after it is placed.
crab_trap_recipe.flavor: Crabs will spawn around it if there are none near.

fish_container_recipe.description: Easier to sell your fish this way.

input_fish_rack_recipe.description: A container for fish, to help keep crafters supplied.
input_fish_rack_recipe.flavor: Better than storing it in the floor

pearl_container_recipe.description: Easier to sell your pearls this way.

sashimi_recipe.description: Fresh raw fish sliced into thin pieces

dock_recipe.description: Place it at an edge facing the water. The fisher will recognize this as a fishing spot and use it when fishing.
dock_recipe.flavor: Fish loves to be under its shadow

ice_dock_recipe.description: Place over the snow and ice to make a hole. The fisher will recognize this as a fishing spot and use it when fishing.
ice_dock_recipe.flavor: Fish loves to swim near the hole

archipelago.description: Water everywhere, or sand, whichever is disliked most

insane_octopus.description: Smaller octopus tend to flock around them.

introduction.title: A help from the seas
introduction.message_start:
Hey, nice to meet you! I'm Miranda. Want some help?
I can talk about a few things if you are new here in the islands.
introduction.message_accept:
Yes! Finally someone accepted my help!
Er... I mean, follow me!
introduction.message_trees:
You will start looking for wood and food, right?
Here we have both with palm trees!
When you harvest them you get coconuts. Those don't fill much though.
Harvesting it a second time (while it has no coconuts) will instead chop it for wood.
introduction.message_oysters:
Oh, and these big oysters are awesome. Only a fisher can harvest them and their pearls sell for a good amount.
Rumours mention rare black pearls, but I never saw one myself.
introduction.message_broken_boats:
Take a look around and you may find some shipwrecks.
You can scavenger those and find good treasures.
introduction.message_bye:
That's all for now.
I'll return later to check how you guys are doing.
I need to take advantage of this good wind and set sail, my ship will not fill itself with goods and treasures.
Bye bye and good luck.

miranda_before_selling_clay.title: Too much clay on my boat
miranda_before_selling_clay.message_start: I made some trades with a Rayya merchant. Did you know they have a lot of clay, super cheap? I couldn't refuse, but now I have too much of it!
miranda_before_selling_clay.message_convincing: I can't sail with the ship being so heavy! What you say? Can I sell some to you? I guess you will need some as you don't have much land to dig for it...

miranda_notice_a_lost_crate.title: Did you lost a crate?
miranda_notice_a_lost_crate.message_start: By the way, while we were trading I noticed this crate near your camp. I'm guessing it is yours, so I put it near your camp flag.

teaches_how_to_break_crate.title: Curious?
teaches_how_to_break_crate.message_start:
Aren't you going to open that crate? Maybe it is important or it can spoils!
(To open it, select it then click on the open button)

miranda_talks_about_cocolings.title: Cocolings
miranda_talks_about_cocolings.message_start: I'm sorry that you got attacked yesterday. Those cocolings are appearing everywhere lately...
miranda_talks_about_cocolings.message_2:
Yes. They are causing problems in many other islands too!
We still don't know how they got here or why...
There are many other islanders trying to figured this mystery out.

miranda_notice_another_crate.title: Another crate...
miranda_notice_another_crate.message_start: Watch out, I just saw another crate at your island! Better move your guards before opening it.

shield_spawned.found: The fisher saw something in the water

lets_trade_again.title: Let's trade again?
lets_trade_again.message_start:
Hi! Wanna buy some useless items again?
Oh, sorry, didn't noticed you had visitors. I will return later.
lets_trade_again.message_those_guys: Yes, those guys over there. Let me show you.

visitors_introduction.title: We need help
visitors_introduction.message_start: Hi, I'm Anya. Sorry to land into your town so suddenly. We didn't have much choice.
visitors_introduction.message_2:
I'm sure you heard about the cocolings, right? They were annoying, but not a threat.
Not until a couple days ago.
The men stayed to fight while we came seeking for help. We need mostly food, if possible.
visitors_introduction.message_3:
Thanks! We will place a bin near your town flag where you can put the food.
Meanwhile, we can help you working in your town.

teaches_how_to_donate_food.title: Do you need help?
teaches_how_to_donate_food.message_start:
The food bin is not full yet?
(To start filling it, click on it, and activate the food filter)

anya_says_she_will_leave.message_start: Hey! You did it! Thank you.
anya_says_she_will_leave.message_2: So, I guess this means we are ready to go. We will leave in the morning at 8:00, ok?
anya_says_she_will_leave.title: Food bin filled

miranda_offers_a_ride.title: Bye bye
miranda_offers_a_ride.message_start: I can not believe how much you helped us. Thank you.
miranda_offers_a_ride.message_2: Now, where is our old raft?
miranda_offers_a_ride.message_3: Old raft? No no. We are going in my ship. With it we will get there in no time.
miranda_offers_a_ride.message_4:
Thank you Miranda. Thanks guys. We should go.
Wish us luck! Bye!

goblin_donation.title: A goblin with a bucket approaches
goblin_donation.message_1:
Hey fool. I found this bucket, but it is trash, so it must be yours. It does not fit in my head, see?

(Points to own head)
goblin_donation.message_2:
I don't care about what you do with it. You can burn it for all I care!

(Throws the bucket in the ground, kicks it, and then goes away angry)
